channel.title: Belon.gs - Never lose your stuff anymore
channel.description:
http://belon.gs/
"Ever lost anything important? Yeah, well, so have we and it's getting tiresome to always be buying new phones, iPads, jackets, watches, what-have-you... So we built Belon.gs – to make it easier for the things inevitably lost to find back to their owner.
It's simple: You just tag your most important things with a little discreet sticker, and when if that thing gets lost, the finder will likely see the sticker and get back to you. Oh, and did we mention it's free to get started?"
We launced open beta earlier this week and now I wanted to introduce belon.gs to you guys aswell. Feedback, comments, questions and conversation about belon.gs is much appreciated.

[quote]Let you receive a reward if you return a lost item tagged with a Belon.gs tag

Found this in the about us section of the website, what kind of rewards? Seems potential for abuse.[/quote]

The reward feature is not yet available on open beta. Sending the reward to the founder of lost item will always require action from the user. The site itself will never automatically send any rewards.
